textSub.name: tagline
textSub.string: Do you know what to do when danger threatens?

textSub.name: para1
textSub.string: These are dangerous waters. Watch out for mines coming\n from above, and jellyfish coming from below!\n

textSub.name: para2
textSub.string:
HINT:
 Did you know that you can move mines by using your
 suck ability? With practice, you can move them out
 of your way, or even suck them right into other fish!
